entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
